body.name: Joanbro TS1D 2.4GHz Portable Wireless Speakers for TV for Seniors and Hard of Hearing, Optical/RCA/AUX Supported, Voice Highlighting and Tone Control, 100ft Long Range TV Speaker
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Joanbro US and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 22 hrs 55 mins
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 22 hrs 55 mins
features: RF wireless TV speaker with voice highlighting and Tone(treble/normal/bass) adjustment for improved voice clarity on TV and movies, it makes each word intelligible, perfect for seniors, couples, families or anyone who wants to optimize TV volume clearly, comfortably and conveniently. - Not Bluetooth device.

Supports multiple connections, optical, RCA or AUX with independent volume control, easy to use, simply connect the transmitter dock to your TV via the digital or analog audio output and bring the speaker next to you to listen. Digital optical connection requires a separate PCM setting on TV. Besides, people who use medical devices such as pacemaker, it is recommended to check with your doctor before purchasing.

Wireless handy speaker with two charging methods, one is charged by placing onto the transmitter base, the other is connected to AC adapter for charging / power. It provides superb clearly voice with a wireless range of up to 100 feet, you can take the wireless amplified speaker outdoor or anywhere in the house so you don't miss your favorite TV programs.

Equipped with a lightweight under-chin headsets, just plug the headset into the speaker's "AUDIO OUT" port, you can quietly enjoy your favorite TV shows without disturbing your family. The portable TV speaker can also be used independently as a common wired speaker. You only need to connect the audio source device to the speaker's "AUDIO IN" interface.

A complete speaker set with an optical audio cable, an AUX audio cable, an RCA audio cable and 2 AC adapters. You will also receive 1 wireless receiver and 1 transmitter dock and an under-chin wired headset as well as 1-year limited warranty.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: TV Audio Listening Speaker for Hearing Impaired Elderly with Independent Volume Control Switch, Require NO Wifi or Bluetooth, Portable Wireless TV Speakers for Hard of Hearing Seniors, No Audio Delay, 2.4GHz Transmission Frequency, TV Sound Enhancer See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Joanbro Wireless TV Speakers Ideal for TV Watching with NO More Blaring Volume Wireless TV speakers consist of a base that is wired to your older TV or smart television via optical/RCA/3.5mm AUX cable, and a wireless speaker that receive sound from the transmitting base. With this portable remote TV speaker, you do not need to crank up the TV volume all the way up. No more blasting TV volume. Keep your family in peace and your neighbors happy with Joanbro assistive TV listening speakers! Before Purchasing! 1. This TV speaker wireless is compatible with TV's Digital Optical (Toslink/SPDIF), RCA or 3.5mm AUX Audio Out port. If you need to connect via HDMI or receiver’s 6.35 phone jack,additional adapter(not included) is required. 2. Do set the TV’s digital audio format to PCM (or OFF Dolby), when you connect the transmitter with digital optical cable. 3. TV speakers designed for hard of hearing seniors transmit TV audio on 2.4GHz Radio frequency, not a Bluetooth speaker for your television. No pairing or password is required. 4. Write to Joanbro support for troubleshooting if needed.

Thanks to 2.4GHz wireless transmission working frequency, this portable wireless TV speaker from Joanbro can be taken any anywhere in your house, e.g. den, bedroom, kitchen, or outdoor garden and still transmit your TV audio to you with perfect clarity.

Hear TV words and dialogues clearly with your wireless speaker over a distance of up to 100 ft. No need to worry audio lag or delay as this wireless speaker transmit TV audio using 2.4GHz transmission band. Visual and audio is well synced. Wireless TV listening speaker system can work on any TVs or set-up box that has optical (SPDIF), RCA or headphone jack. If you want to connect the speaker system to TV’s HDMI ports, additional HDMI adapter is needed. This speaker system does not work with any RED and WHITE ports labelled “AUDIO IN”, “COMPOSITE IN”, “COMPONENT IN”. Independently control the output volume via the speaker’s volume control. Knob is big easy and big enough for seniors and the elderly to operate. Two AC adapters are included, one for the charging base, another for speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This device is perfect for seniors or anyone looking for clear sound
reviews.reviewText: Very simple setup and operation. High quality feel and big power/volume knob. Rechargable battery. Sound synchs with video perfectly. Mono audio, but this makes human voices so much clearer and easier to understand for people who are struggling with their hearing. Can be turned up very loud if needed. This little guy sits on our kitchen table all day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliability and Joanbro support
reviews.reviewText: This product, while a bit confusing to learn to use as noted in other reviews, worked well for a while. I owned this just short of two years and now it is outside the warranty period. The unit stopped working and will not turn on. The base continues to work.I contacted Joanbro and they promptly replied asking me to try using the adaptor from the base. I did this and nothing happened. However, the very first thing they mentioned is that it had a one year limited warranty. I am continuing to work with them, but would not recommend this product given the lack of reliability and the company's support of its products. I will update with progress on the issue.Update: The company responded quickly again, said the speaker was likely broken and is sending me a replacement! Although the warranty is one year, they said they want to solve their customers issues, and so they have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've spent a small fortune on hearing devices over the past four years and until today, they at lasted for around 6 months before craping the bed. This item, even after reading the book and charging the three hours before turning it on. The only thing that worked was the led lights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Television sound !
reviews.reviewText: Beats the soundbars we have had to listen to television being hearing impaired. Hung at ear level along with the noise cansulation feature this is great for me! The headphone feature helps even more when necessary. Would like a switch for the headphone operation so I do not have to unplug it for regular use. Loud enough however the clarity means it can be comprehended better for voice at lower volume with the treble switch activated. Thanks for offering this choice Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product has really made a difference for my mom. The volume level was like a concert coming from her room. Louder was not allowing her to follow dialogue. This really was a game changer for her. We have gone thru 2 in 3 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband has hearing aids that he won’t wear half the time but he loves watching television all day. ( we’re retired ). So this is perfect for him. He has it on all day. Now the TV isn’t at full volume all the time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m Hard of hearing . Sound quality is good is good, but on off switch works erratically.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of Use
reviews.reviewText: This is a great speaker to use as an extension for television speakers. I have a really loud window air conditioner that makes hearing my television very difficult. This speaker helps bring the sound right next to me so the AC doesn't drown it out. The sound quality is good and the product is extremely simple. The instructions provided give plenty of details and options on how to connect the device. In my case, it was just one cable from the TV to the transmitter. I'd highly recommend this product for anybody that needs to get their TV sound closer to their position, whether they are hard of hearing or there are other distracting noises in the room.
